motion_summary: The subject moves the cigar from being held near the mouth to actively smoking it, with the money remaining stationary in the right hand.
summary_text: A man in a dimly lit, upscale environment smokes a cigar while holding a stack of 100 Euro banknotes. The sequence captures the subtle shift in his interaction with the cigar, from holding it to actively smoking it, with the money remaining a prominent, static element.
